I. Inline features

You can declare HTML entities by code point (ex: €), or by name (ex: €). Another example is &, the <, the >, the ", and '.

This is a paragraph with bold text, italic text, and monospaced text. It also contains text in small caps, correctedfixed text, superscripts, and subscripts. Also, all of this emphasised text should appear on the same line.

This paragraph contains an external link to Wikipedia, and an internal link to Section 13, a smarter link to Section 13, and a manual link to that same section. Finally, it also contains a note(1) and bibliography references[1].

II. Block features

1. Unordered lists

  • One item

  • Another item

  • Yet another item

2. Ordered lists

  1. One item

  2. Another item

  3. Yet another item

3. Definition lists

One item

One item description

Another item

Another item description

Yet another item

Yet another item description

This is a quote.

Alpha Bravo Charlie Delta

This is verbatim.
